resources.string: This one-time operation will take a brief moment
Unpacking post install data. This might take a some time.

Looks like your external storage (/sdcard) is not available. This happens when you connect your device to a PC via USB.\nQGIS can run from the internal storage but this is not recomended as it might be too small.\nIt is suggested to chose CANCEL, disconnect any USB cable and restart QGIS.
Select a QGIS project or dataset
If you enjoy using QField, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!

The QField files directory can be used to copy files and projects onto your device via USB cable. You can see the directory\'s absolute path in the header bar.

Be aware that content of this directory will be deleted if you uninstall QField from your device.

QField needs all files access permission to be able to open local projects and datasets as well as supporting custom projection grids, fonts, and base maps. While not required, allowing access is highly recommended.

On the next screen, please select QField and select the Allow access to all files option.
The selected dataset(s) could not be imported properly.
The selected project archive was not imported properly.
The selected project folder was not imported properly.
This project folder already exists. This operation will overwrite its data, proceed with import?
This dataset already exists. This operation will overwrite it, proceed with import?
One or more datasets already exists. This operation will overwrite these, proceed with import?
The selected project folder was not exported properly.
The dataset will be permamently deleted, proceed with removal?
The project folder will be permamently deleted, proceed with removal?

Whether you are a pre-existing QField 1.x user wondering why your projects and datasets have gone missing or new to QField, we suggest you take a minute to read the storage handling documentation. A shortcut to this documentation will remain accessible in the title bar\'s actions menu.
Please wait while QField is importing the project
Please wait while QField is importing the dataset(s)
